functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Reinforcement of the English Longbow:\\n\\n1x English Longbow\\n64x Stripped Mangrove Logs\\n1x Netherite Ingot\\n1x Fletcher\'s Handsaw\\n\\nAll materials need to be put together on a fletching table."}'],title:"Reinforcement - English Longbow",author:unknown,generation:1,display:{Lore:["English Longbow"]}}
